definition: plain tea and simple food/(fig.) bread and water
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen

sentences.english: Standing alone is drift on water medium of simple fare, flat have no strange but can't remove.
sentences.chinese: 孤獨是漂泊中的粗茶淡飯，平坦無奇卻不可剝離。

sentences.english: I live on bread and water at school.
sentences.chinese: 我在學校時過着粗茶淡飯的生活。
他們吃了一頓粗茶淡飯。

sentences.english: The poor family had for dinner potatoes and point.
sentences.chinese: 這個窮苦家庭三餐粗茶淡飯。

sentences.english: When he was a student, he lived on bread and water.
sentences.chinese: 他當學生的時候，每天靠粗茶淡飯過活。

sentences.english: All we can offer you is humble fare.
sentences.chinese: 就請你粗茶淡飯湊合一頓。

definition: brocade garments, jade meals (idiom); a life of luxury/extravagance
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
lit. clear window and clean table (idiom)/fig. bright and clean
to eat and eat/to stuff oneself
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
